tutorialMessages: The Paradox are introducing two new conditions: Symmetry that activates if the opposing card is directly opposite the card played.
And Asymmetry that activates if the opposing card is not opposite the card played.
Use your Symmetry and Asymmetry cards at just the right moment! Over to you!
